original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role offers a unique opportunity to blend your business acumen and technical proficiency, serving as a crucial link between complex business processes and effective system configurations. As a Configuration Specialist, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate at peak efficiency, with a strong focus on developing innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space. Leveraging your expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), you will drive the development of cutting-edge technical solutions that streamline and optimize our operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and translate them into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend.
- Develop and maintain detailed configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations to support the evolving needs of the business.
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations, troubleshoot and resolve any configuration-related issues that arise.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging data querying, reporting, and visualization tools.
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices.
- Ensure comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and support.
- Collaborate cross-functionally with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to quickly identify and resolve complex technical issues.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and utilize data visualization tools to uncover insights.
- Strong understanding of business processes and the ability to align technical solutions with organizational objectives.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience in implementing and supporting Agile practices.

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to efficiently configure and maintain the [mention specific system] backend.
- Expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence, with a proven track record of leveraging these technologies to develop innovative solutions.
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing a deep understanding of the domain.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and supporting machine learning and AI-driven solutions.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and familiarity with Agile methodologies and practices.
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration systems and processes, enabling you to hit the ground running.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using various data analysis and reporting tools, such as SQL, Excel, and data visualization software.
- Familiarity with configuration management and version control tools, such as Git and Jira.
- Experience in utilizing project management and collaboration tools to effectively coordinate cross-functional efforts.

As a Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between complex business requirements and efficient system configurations. This position offers a unique opportunity to leverage your technical expertise and business acumen to drive the development of innovative solutions within the vehicle configuration space. By harnessing the power of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), you will be at the forefront of transforming our operations and ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of the business.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and translate them into effective technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend.
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations to support the ongoing evolution of our systems and processes.
- Implement new configurations, thoroughly test them to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to uncover valuable insights.
- Proactively recommend ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through the implementation of configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices.
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support the ongoing maintenance and support of the solutions.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of the system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to quickly identify and resolve complex technical issues.
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and utilize data visualization tools to uncover insights.
- Deep understanding of business processes and the ability to align technical solutions with organizational objectives.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience in implementing and supporting Agile practices.

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to efficiently configure and maintain the [mention specific system] backend.
- Expertise in machine learning and artificial intelligence, with a proven track record of leveraging these technologies to develop innovative solutions.
- Knowledge of vehicle configuration systems and processes, providing a deep understanding of the domain.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and supporting machine learning and AI-driven solutions.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment and familiarity with Agile methodologies and practices.
- Prior exposure to vehicle configuration systems and processes, enabling you to hit the ground running.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using various data analysis and reporting tools, such as SQL, Excel, and data visualization software.
- Familiarity with configuration management and version control tools, such as Git and Jira.
- Experience in utilizing project management and collaboration tools to effectively coordinate cross-functional efforts.
